Title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
Actors: Michael Shannon, Willem Dafoe, Chloë Sevigny, Udo Kier
Plot: The police are called to a murder scene and quickly discover that the murderer, the victim's son, is holed up in his house with two hostages. Through a series of interviews with both the murderer's fiancée and his theatre director the police piece together a picture of a man losing touch with reality.
